title: Map-Territory Distinctions
summary:
Key ideas:
- The author's trash can has not been getting emptied due to the can being oversized and against regulations.
- The author attempted to put a sign on the can for the garbage-people to understand, but it did not work.
- The author is contemplating what message to put on the trash can to make the garbage-people take the trash.
 
Key learnings:
- Sometimes regulations can cause inconvenience.
- Practical solutions don't always work.
- Finding the right message takes time and creativity.

Key questions:
- Why are the garbage-people unwilling to take oversized trash cans?
- How can the author create a message that will resonate with the garbage-people?
- What can be done in the meantime while the author waits for a solution?
